amendment.description: Amendment to allow for priority consideration to science and technology schools once the funds reach their local educational agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-678 to allow for priority consideration to science and technology schools once the funds reach their local educational agencies.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Davis, Tom.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Tom amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
